mplstyle.hover.matplotlibPath.description: The installation directory of matplotlib used to generate the documentation, e.g. /home/foo/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages/matplotlib. The data shipped with the extension will be used if the value is an empty string.

mplstyle.hover.showImages.description: Controls whether to show images in hover

mplstyle.preview.pythonPath.description: Path to the Python executable to display previews, e.g. /usr/bin/python3, defaults to the output of `which python3 || which py || which python` (Linux, Mac) or `where python3 || where py || where python` (Windows)

mplstyle.preview.activateOnSave.description: Controls whether to show the preview panel on save

mplstyle.preview.codeLens.enabled.description: Controls whether to show a button to show previewer on the editor

mplstyle.preview.userPlots.markdownDescription: Adds Python scripts that can be used in the previewer. Example: `["/home/foo/plot1.py", "/home/foo/plot2.py"]`

scripts.build: npm run build:license && npm run build:webview && npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.watch: npm run build:license && concurrently "npm run build:webview -- --watch" "npm run build:node -- --watch" "npm run build:browser -- --watch"
scripts.build:webview: shx cp node_modules/@vscode/webview-ui-toolkit/dist/toolkit.js src/preview/webview-ui-toolkit.js && shx cp node_modules/@vscode/codicons/dist/codicon.css src/preview/codicon.css && esbuild --bundle src/preview/webview.ts --outfile=./src/preview/webview.js --target=esnext
scripts.clean: shx rm -f "src/**/*.js" && shx rm -f "src/**/codicon.css" && shx rm -f LICENSE-THIRD-PARTY.txt
